name: ObfuscateAssembly
description: Replaces assembly with its obfuscated version
author: Innofactor Sweden

inputs.name: assembly
inputs.label: Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to assembly file to obfuscate

inputs.name: level
inputs.label: Obfuscation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Level of assembly obfuscation — please consider using `Recommended` level for Microsoft Dynamics CRM assemblies — it will combined reasonable protection with maximum possible speed and size of the assembly

inputs.name: key
inputs.label: Sign assembly with following key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to key file to sign assembly
